name: Onisiphorus and Porphyry
Matrona
kontakia: (Tone 2) Appearing as radiant lights, O godly martyrs,* you illumine all creation with the brilliance of your miracles,* healing infirmities, always dispelling deep darkness* and praying unceasingly to Christ our God for all of us.

(Tone 8) You passed through the storm of life without faltering, chosen and godly mother,* guided to the harbour of life, where you sing hymns to the Deliverer!* You ever pray for us,* that Christ may grant us grace and mercy:** you preserve the flock which you painstakingly gathered!
